name: Hungering Hordes
description:
Kill zombies to earn points. Beware as they come back hungrier and in greater numbers.

Made by a single person during a 40 hour game jam. My first time doing a game jam solo.  All assets are mine.

Best played with a mouse, keyboard, and headphones.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

1 - Weapon Slot 1

2 - Weapon Slot 2

ESC - Pause
